text: "I Found a Girl" is a song written by P. F. Sloan and Steve Barri, and recorded by 1960s American pop singers, Jan and Dean. "I Found a Girl" reached up to number 30 on the US Billboard Hot 100 on November 20, 1965.Joel Whitburn's Top Pop Singles 1955-1990 - The song was a much bigger hit in Canada, where it reached number two.https://www.billboard.com/music/jan- dean/chart-history/hot-100/song/577886 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- !Chart (1965-66) !Peak position |- |Canada RPM Top Singles | style="text-align:center;"|2 |- |U.S. Billboard Hot 100Joel Whitburn's Top Pop Singles 1955-1990 - | style="text- align:center;"|30 |- |U.S. Cash Box Top 100 |align="center"|39 |} == References == ==External links== * Lyrics of this song * Category:1965 songs Category:1965 singles Category:Jan and Dean songs Category:Liberty Records singles Category:Songs written by P. F. Sloan Category:Songs written by Steve Barri
